channel.title: Miscs on Rishabh Kumar
channel.description: Recent content in Miscs on Rishabh Kumar

item.title: About Me
item.description: I work at a boutique management consultancy which specialises in behavioural and data science. Working with clients across sectors from telecom to financial to media has given me immense understanding about applying behavioural and data science to improve products and services. My colleagues would describe me as a sociable and entrepreneurial person. Last year I conceptualised and organised an event bringing in new and older clients to share the latest thinking in behavioural science.
